["DescriptionAQUA Properties is pleased to offer this exquisite 5-bedroom plus maid's room townhouse in Maple 1, Dubai Hills Estate. Featuring large windows, elegant flooring, stylish countertops and neat kitchen designs, this off-plan project ensures comfortable family living within a sought-after community. * 5 Bedrooms
* Type 3E
* BUA : 2,700 sq.ft.

* Maid's room
* Corner unit
* Unfurnished

* Attractive payment plan
* Spacious car parking
* Private garden
* 18 hole golf-course within the development
As part of Dubai Hills Estate, Maple project features 3, 4 and 5-bedroom townhouses ideally set in verdant surrounding providing the perfect balance between indoor and outdoor living. With a built-up area between 2,200 and 2,700 square feet, Maple homes include a maid’s room, covered parking and a generous lush garden. Located on the verge of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road, the project offers easy access to the most happening areas of the city."]

["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this amazing Two-bedroom apartment in La Vie, Jumeirah Beach Residences.
La Vie is a high-rise residential tower being developed by Dubai Properties in JBR (Jumeirah Beach Residences). The tower will feature 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom contemporary apartments overlooking the Arabian Sea, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island and is located in one of the hotspots of Dubai.
The apartments offer full floor-to-ceiling glass to allow for abundant natural light throughout the unit and to maximize the beautiful sea and skyline views of Dubai. La Vie is a great opportunity for end-users and investors. For investors, a one or two bedroom apartment can fetch high ROI if they decide to put it up for short-term rentals, given it is a beachfront community with a range of retail and f&b outlets and a cinema.
The tower has been divided into four tiers. The one beds are located on the back-side of the building, offering views of the JBR skyline and city views. One beds can be found in Tier 1 - 4.There are various options for two beds (either on the corner or middle unit facing the sea). Both offer great views. The three bed units start from Tier 2. These are located on the front side of the building offering some amazing views. The 4 beds are located in Tier 3 and are located at the front of the building, overlooking the sea. Tier 4 features the penthouses. These are located on floors 35 to 36 (4 penthouses in total - overlooking the sea, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island - all located towards the front of the building).
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is proud to offer this stunning One-bedroom Apartment in Grande, DownTown Dubai.
Grande at the Opera District is a 78-storey residential development located in the heart of Downtown Dubai. This project features luxurious one, two, three, and four bedroom apartments overlooking the Burj Khalifa and The Dubai Fountain. This will be one of the highest residential towers and is probably being built on one of the last few plots in Downtown. It will be in the top 3 luxurious buildings within Downtown Dubai.
Grande offers a not-to-miss investment opportunity given the high demand for property in Downtown Dubai. Panoramic Views of the Dubai Fountain, Burj Khalifa & The Arabian Gulf. Next door to the Dubai Opera, Burj Park, Souq Al Bahar & Dubai Mall. Only Steps Away from the Vibrant Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard. World Class Retail Outlets and Al Fresco Dinning restaurants on your door steps. Infinity Pool, State-of-the-art fitness center, Health Club, Kids Playground.
This is a luxury building located in close proximity to the Opera House. The apartments will have a modern finish/design with floor-to-celiing windows, luxury fittings, and front-row views to the dancing fountains and Burj Khalifa.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]
